amendment.description: Amendment adds language to the section of the bill concerning human rights reforms and specifies that country-specific resolutions shall not be eliminated within the human rights body in the U.N.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in subpart D of Part 1 of House Report 109-132 to add an additional paragraph to the list of reforms in section 201 (b), which the President shall direct the U.S. Permanent Representative to the U.N. to achieve in the area of human rights reforms. The new paragraph states that country specific resolutions shall not be eliminated.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Royce amendment (A011) Agreed to by recorded vote: 373 - 32 (Roll no. 274).
